title: A Compilation of Exercises for Personal Development
first_phrase: In the final section of this manual, titled "Contatti," the authors provide a summary of the various exercises and techniques discussed throughout the text for the development of the human being in a predominantly Western tradition. The previous exercises range from physical movements to mental practices, including exercises for the thyroid, kidneys, and gonads, as well as techniques for relaxation and drawing. The authors state that in selecting their reference authors, they have been mindful of the true tradition.

last_phrase: We hope that these exercises and techniques can be beneficial to your personal growth and development. With a combination of traditional and personal approaches, we invite you to contact us to deepen your understanding and experience group practice, which can be particularly effective in combining energies for quicker progress.
